title: Portfolio
subtitle: My work Portfolio
resumetextfirst: When developing JavaScript applications, I make use of the right tools, working perfectly in teams, or creating solutions on my own, developing interfaces on the front-end, as well as writing business logic on the back-end!
resumetextsecond: Fusing back-end and front-end, providing fast, practical, strong solutions, designed around the client's ideas and needs and their objectives, optimized to be scalable!
